Nightstrike::


"How many miles are they of the base?"asked Nightstrike

> ::FireStrike::
> FireStrike looked over to his brother with new hatred in his 
> eyes. "Leave them be brother. Megatron can handle this himself. 
ButI 
> can see others in the distance on approach. We can get them."
>

> >

I

> his 
> > weapons

> right

pistol.
